data.DescriptionHtml:
This enchantment clouds the target animal's mind.
The subject is not stunned, so attackers get no special advantage against it, but it cannot move or attack.
data.Name: Daze Animal
data.Rulebook: Masters of the Wild: A Guidebook to Barbarians, Druids, and Rangers
data.Target: One Medium-size or smaller animal with less than 5 HD
